document.full_text: a new report from the drug company glaxosmithkline concludes that its antidepressant paxil might make adults with major depression more likely to become suicidal.
document.title: more suicidal thoughts with antidepressant: report
lines_and_colors: a new report from the drug company glaxosmithkline concludes that its antidepressant paxil might make adults with major depression more likely to become suicidal.
